Multi-Platform Support

Your Game, Any Platform

We manufacture cartridges for all major retro gaming systems. Each platform meticulously supported with accurate hardware implementation. Do not see yours? We love a challenge.

Systems We Support

Supported Platforms

Choose your platform. We handle the technical complexity so you can focus on your game.

NES
(1985)
Nintendo Entertainment System
MOQ: 100
CPU
Ricoh 2A03
Memory
2KB RAM
Save Type
Battery or EEPROM
Lead Time
4-6 weeks

Key Features

  • 72-pin cartridge
  • MMC1/3/5 mapper support
  • Nametable mirroring
  • 4-screen VRAM options
SNES
(1991)
Super Nintendo
MOQ: 100
CPU
Ricoh 5A22
Memory
128KB RAM
Save Type
Battery, EEPROM, or Flash
Lead Time
4-6 weeks

Key Features

  • HiROM/LoROM support
  • SA-1 coprocessor
  • Super FX support
  • DSP-1 compatible
Game Boy
(1989)
Original Game Boy
MOQ: 100
CPU
Sharp LR35902
Memory
8KB RAM
Save Type
Battery or EEPROM
Lead Time
4-6 weeks

Key Features

  • MBC1/3/5 mapper support
  • Rumble pak compatible
  • Real-time clock (RTC)
  • Original DMG format

CPU
Sharp LR35902
Memory
32KB RAM

Battery or EEPROM

Key Features

MOQ: 100
CPU
ARM7TDMI
Memory
256KB RAM
Save Type
EEPROM, Flash, or SRAM

4-6 weeks

Key Features

  • 32-bit processing
  • RTC support

  • Accelerometer compatible

Motorola 68000

64KB RAM

Key Features
